title: Marauder Ashe
body: I love the new Ashe skin riot. I think it can become better with black arrows or a color to match the skin. Almost every Ashe skin has the arrows change colors. It's like a custom for her arrows to change with each skin. The skin is well made and looks amazing but I think it would look more amazing with black arrows. Please respond with what you think of the idea riot. Others also tell me what you think of the idea. Thank you

replies.body: You're correct in that an older Ashe skin has particles. However, beginning in 2013, we created a more clear set of guidelines for skin tiers, and the kinds of changes a skin would be receiving. You can find out more about the skin tiers [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752874-Skin-RP-Price-Changes).

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=9MgG2On6,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-29T17:59:38.268+0000)
>
> You're correct in that an older Ashe skin has particles. However, beginning in 2013, we created a more clear set of guidelines for skin tiers, and the kinds of changes a skin would be receiving. You can find out more about the skin tiers [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752874-Skin-RP-Price-Changes).

This might be true, but if i compare the marauder ashe skin with the two inquisitor skins, i recognice these things:

1. For Sivir everything, she throws got adjusted to what her new weapon. Her AAs AND her Q. Ofcourse it would look strange if her weapon woudl completely change after leaving her hand. But why is it ok for Ashe's arrows to change colour after leaving her bow? I'm not talking about the arrows with slow effects or even her E or R. Just her AAs should (and could, since its ok for the Sivirskin) be recoloured imo.

2. If the fact, that Sivirs abilities did indeed get adjustments to match the weapon in her hand, isn't enough, we can look at the nautilus skin: He even got completely new particls on his shield. Not jsut a recolour to match hs silver armour, but the small shields have a completely new silouet.

Concluding: You say, that the Ashe skin can't get any adjsutments on her projectiles (neither a recolour of her AAs, nor a recolour of her abilities (like changing the white of the freezingeffect to a red or any other darker colour etc.)) because she is just a 750 RP skin. That would be ok for me, but at the same time, you have two other new skins on the pbe, who have recolours of projectiles and even completely new particles on some abilities.
To me this feels very inconsistan. Why do you follow the rules for 750 RP skins reguarding Ashe and then at the same time pretty much ignoring them for two other 750 RP skins? Could you pls enlighten me?

*(Excuse the copy pasta from another post)*

We change a particle when it's something that would look really awkward if we didn't.

For example, Nautilus' Titan's Wrath shields on his base skin would look really out of place with the new armor he's got. We also changed his eye glow because having two red glowing eyes coming out of a helmet with six slits would look pretty crappy.

We did the same thing with Sivir's Boomerang Blade. It wouldn't make sense if it looked as though she were throwing a different weapon, as compared to the one she's holding.

We felt that Marauder Ashe still made a good amount of sense, even with her base particles.

Hi Katey, I appreciate you replying to the players and taking the heat even though it might not be your decision to do this. I read your reply, both here and in the original thread, but it doesn't actually address his first point:

> 1. For Sivir everything, she throws got adjusted to what her new weapon. Her AAs AND her Q. Ofcourse it would look strange if her weapon woudl completely change after leaving her hand. But why is it ok for Ashe's arrows to change colour after leaving her bow? I'm not talking about the arrows with slow effects or even her E or R. Just her AAs should (and could, since its ok for the Sivirskin) be recoloured imo.

He actually has a point. The skin obviously shows Ashe's arrows as being black: http://www.noobabble.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/01/Marauder-Ashe-Poses.png
However, after being fired, her arrows would retain the original skin's look, which is whitish with a cold trail, even without her Q on.

Do you think that this can justify her getting just an update to her normal attack projectile, nothing else?

I would like to see the arrow projectile changed aswell, even if it's literally just the view model being swapped out with the arrow in the skin. Maybe pretty much even leave all the frost effects the same on it but I want to be able to tell it's the same arrow after she fires. D:

I am okay with the ECA or Ashe ult to remain the same, it's just the auto and I guess Volley that should get a tiny change.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=9MgG2On6,comment-id=000100040000,timestamp=2015-02-03T17:46:52.541+0000)
>
> We change a particle when it's something that would look really awkward if we didn't.



> [{quoted}](name=Ariaflux,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=9MgG2On6,comment-id=0001000400000000,timestamp=2015-02-03T18:02:26.572+0000)
> 
> He actually has a point. The skin obviously shows Ashe's arrows as being black: http://www.noobabble.com/wp-

The OP above has a point about the black arrows... 

Just like in the sweetheart Annie skin, we aren't looking for new particles, we are looking for a different color of the same particle...

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=9MgG2On6,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-29T17:59:38.268+0000)
>
> You're correct in that an older Ashe skin has particles. However, beginning in 2013, we created a more clear set of guidelines for skin tiers, and the kinds of changes a skin would be receiving. You can find out more about the skin tiers [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articlesou/201752874-Skin-RP-Price-Changes).

Everyone should be quite aware of the Skin tiers, but nonetheless seriously, this skin is something completely opposite to who Ashe is. She is (imo) the Light of the Freljord, a beacon of hope and unity, but when you create this skin you've  basically said she can have an alter ego skin; a savage against the Freljord, a hunter to those who fight against The Marauders, no one should expect arrows from (imo) the Darker side of Ashe to be "Bright Baby Blue"! They should represent and portray her with "Darker Blue if not Blackish" arrows. This is 2015 and you're saying that skins from the 750 RP tier "**Sometimes includes**": new animations? Not to say that every tier has this but it just sound really silly and unattractive to YOUR community, YOUR consumers/custumers, and the ones who play this game will be sorely disappointed to see a new ashe skin be nothing more than just **model changes, new texture, new splash image** If you want us to be impressed with skins which im not saying we havent been, then **strive to be better than the standard**. Thats what good companies do; they show they are more then what they put on paper.

> [{quoted}](name=Sinspurch,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=9MgG2On6,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2015-01-29T19:15:00.829+0000)
>
> Everyone should be quite aware of the Skin tiers, but nonetheless seriously, this skin is something completely opposite to who Ashe is. She is (imo) the Light of the Freljord, a beacon of hope and unity, but when you create this skin you've  basically said she can have an alter ego skin; a savage against the Freljord, a hunter to those who fight against The Marauders, no one should expect arrows from (imo) the Darker side of Ashe to be "Bright Baby Blue"! They should represent and portray her with "Darker Blue if not Blackish" arrows. This is 2015 and you're saying that skins from the 750 RP tier "**Sometimes includes**": new animations? Not to say that every tier has this but it just sound really silly and unattractive to YOUR community, YOUR consumers/custumers, and the ones who play this game will be sorely disappointed to see a new ashe skin be nothing more than just **model changes, new texture, new splash image** If you want us to be impressed with skins which im not saying we havent been, then **strive to be better than the standard**. Thats what good companies do; they show they are more then what they put on paper.

I agree that this skin is the opposite of who Ashe is - but that's intended.  Inquisitor Ashe would be similar mood to Queen Ashe (proud, bright and royal). It's similar to the reason that we didn't do Marauder Sivir - because Marauder Sivir would be a similar mood to Bandit Sivir (dark spiky armor).

We want to create more skins of various price tiers because there's some people who want a new skin with all kinds of bells and whistles, and there are others who simply want new armor, or a new outfit for their skin.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=9MgG2On6,comment-id=000100020000,timestamp=2015-01-29T19:35:24.759+0000)
>
> I agree that this skin is the opposite of who Ashe is - but that's intended.  Inquisitor Ashe would be similar mood to Queen Ashe (proud, bright and royal). It's similar to the reason that we didn't do Marauder Sivir - because Marauder Sivir would be a similar mood to Bandit Sivir (dark spiky armor).
> 
> We want to create more skins of various price tiers because there's some people who want a new skin with all kinds of bells and whistles, and there are others who simply want new armor, or a new outfit for their skin.

But is it REALLY such a drastic price change on the Marauder Ashe skin to change the arrows color texture? Riot KateyKhaos you make MONEY off players wanting skins because of their fantastic particles/textures/animations/splash art etc. So it is not fair to say Marauder Ashe deserves "Maraudish Arrows"?

When Riot makes cheap skins, people complain because they want more effects.

When Riot makes skins with effects (that thus cost more money), people complain because they want cheap skins.

THEY CANNOT WIN
It's not that we want more effects I'm so use to ashes changing arrows color that it feels like a tradition for her to have changing arrows

Aren't you afraid that player mistook her for vayne in game?

I mean, a lady in dark clothes with a cape who go botlane is her thing.

> [{quoted}](name=Flemman,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=9MgG2On6,comment-id=0001000200000000,timestamp=2015-01-29T21:33:36.455+0000)
>
> Aren't you afraid that player mistook her for vayne in game?
> 
> I mean, a lady in dark clothes with a cape who go botlane is her thing.

The chances of the skin and vayne in the same matchup is pretty low. imo
I would worry more if it were a Marauder Quinn. Ashe's iconic silhouette is her cape, like you said, but also her large bow.

well, i would say only the bow is iconic to ashe (don't have cape in woad skin) so as long as it glow shiny it would probably do the job (well I believe you do aram test with both character to know if it's too similar :p)
so 1 skin not having it instantly makes it not Iconic? Literally every other skin does. It is an iconic part of her  silhouette.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=9MgG2On6,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-29T17:59:38.268+0000)
>
> You're correct in that an older Ashe skin has particles. However, beginning in 2013, we created a more clear set of guidelines for skin tiers, and the kinds of changes a skin would be receiving. You can find out more about the skin tiers [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752874-Skin-RP-Price-Changes).

None of the guidelines you've linked for skin tiers says anything about particle recolors. A particle recolor shouldn't qualify as "new visual effects" because the visual effects aren't new. They're the same old visual effects, just recolored. If anything, it's the particle equivalent of "texture changes," or "new textures," which are in the guidelines for 390/520 and 750 RP skins, though a lot more work goes into making completely new textures than would go into simply changing the color of existing particles.

I don't see anything that prevents a 750 RP skin from having a particle recolor.
Idk if they will reply on this post again they might now
Question: If someone were to make a mod that gave Marauder Ashe special particles, and then distributed it, would you ban people for using it? Or would that be subjective?

I don't think they ban people for using mods that only affect what you see, so long as it's not giving you a competitive advantage. Although I do believe it's technically against the TOS, so they *could* ban you for it. I just don't think they do, as long as it's benign.

ok ok i have the perfect solution to this problem. after looking at the splash art for the marauder skins, Ashe is shooting frost arrows, and i loved the frost effect with the skin. so cant you just revert the arrows that are on the in game model to her classic ice arrows instead of the steel arrows she has currently? that way it will make sense, because the way she is currently she has steel arrows that turn into ice and it looks really awkward (awkward enough too keep me from buying the skin). i really love the splash and the in game model, its my favorite looking skin by far of the ashe skins. pls riot do it for {{champion:22}} {{item:3070}}

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=9MgG2On6,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-29T17:59:38.268+0000)

You can find out more about the skin tiers [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752874-Skin-RP-Price-Changes).

Hi, I really wish you Rioters can do some adjustments on her loading screen splash. WW covered 40% of her splash, Please!
Thank you!
Ok Ty
It was worth a try
Well, this may just be the first time that Riot ever gets me to buy a skin bundle, if they release Ashe/Sivir/Nautilus/Warwick all at once.

Hey there! 

Since the Marauder and Inquisitor skins are 750 RP, they'll only be receiving a new model and texture. Sorry!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=9MgG2On6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-29T17:36:09.641+0000)
>
> Hey there! 
> 
> Since the Marauder and Inquisitor skins are 750 RP, they'll only be receiving a new model and texture. Sorry!

Woad Ashe is  520 RP with very much greenish arrows, not classic but specific to the skin! The logic that a  750 RP ashe skin only receive classic arrows is total BS Riot.
Ok Ty

Wasted Opportunity to improve on something amazing, only for an incredibly petty reason.
A simple colour swap of the particles would have been more than enough to satisfy and ingratiate the player base that were looking forward to this skin.
Your statements are contradicting of each other. You state that skins are only supposed to have texture/model changes for the 750RP tier. Yet in that same tier we have a pair of skins that have both particle changes, effects changed, and model/texture changes.
Why is it that one set is allowed to go against these guidelines, while the other is forced to conform to them in a way that diminishes the aesthetic value?
This type of inconsistency is highly unprofessional.

You should either move the Marauder Ashe skin down a tier to keep in line with your OWN guidelines, or you bring it in line with the other skins released Parallel in the same tier, keeping the integrity of the tier guidelines.

This type of ambiguous format that your showing is something that will leave players and customers confused and untrusting of future content where everything you say, or do will become suspect.
This isn't even something that you can claim left you in a tight spot with little time to change. 
It's something that was given back to you as feedback with the initial release of the skins on the PBE. A place to take feedback and improve on your product. Customer is always right. That is the philosophy you need to adapt to when it comes to monetary transactions for your products.

I was really looking forward to this skin, but now I don't think I'm going to bother with it. this just seems like the team/person that did the skin half arsed it. even by riots skin tier the pricing doesn't make sense...queen ashe is still 975 and so is amethyst ashe.... but marauder ashe which is essentially a model change  is 750........ I would have gladly paid the 225 extra for some new particles or even if it was 1350. this skin is an amazing concept completely wasted away for no real reason ashe has 5 skins that don't give her theme or particles any real change "the ult on heartseeker is whatever" she doesn't really need another cheap remodel but what ever, its not like there's a ton of community feed back about the the particles clashing with the skin. I enjoy ashe and have all her skins cept for queen ashe, this one was very disappointing even more so because a simple recolor on particles could have made it amazing and made riot more money but who cares about making a better product and making more from it, and I'm not saying riot doesn't know how to business they have an amazing business model but sometimes they let s**t like this slip through the cracks.

Not to be rude but I watched the teaser for the sivir skin and her auto attack and abilities changed with the skin and I don't mean to be rude check if you want but I seems ashe would need something like that too with her old arrow coloring way
